main event: A UFO hovering at 50,000 feet was observed in Jackson, Minnesota on August 13, 1962.
interesting points: The object was described to hover for 3 minutes and 23 seconds before disappearing at high speed., The object moved in a straight line before it made two additional objects., The sighting lasted for a total of 30 minutes., A witness reported seeing a little white light that seemed round., The incident was reported to the CAA Air Route Traffic Control Center.
sighted object: a UFO described as a little white light
